org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.node

Class MockNodeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.node.NodeClient
      • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.node.MockNodeClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Feed, Ingest

    public class MockNodeClient
extends NodeClient
implements Ingest
    Mock client for Bulk API. Do not perform actions on a real cluster. Useful for testing or dry runs.
